body.name: Proctor Silex 4 Slice Countertop Toaster Oven, Multi-Function with Bake, Toast and Broiler, 1100 Watts, 30 min timer and auto-shutoff, Includes Backing Pan and Rack, Black and Silver (31260)

FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 42 mins
features: SAVE TIME IN THE KITCHEN: The toaster oven broiler conveniently toasts 4 slices of bread at once — enough for a family — to reduce the time you spend in the kitchen.

3 IN 1 VERSATILITY: The small toaster oven gives you the versatility to cook 3 ways without taking up much space on the countertop. It toasts, broils, and bakes — great for everyday cooking. Make toast, heat leftovers, and more.

EASY-TO-USE MANUAL CONTROLS: This compact toaster oven has simple controls that are straightforward and easy to use. Perfect for anyone who wants a toaster oven that gets the job done without being complicated. Includes a 30 minute timer with ready bell.
INCLUDES BAKE PAN & OVEN RACK: The toaster oven comes with a bake pan for toasting and baking, and an oven rack for broiling.
EASY TO CLEAN: The built-in crumb tray drops down to easily remove crumbs from the bottom of the toaster oven.
body.description: Conveniently toast 4 slices of bread at once to save time in the kitchen with the Proctor Silex 4 Slice Toaster Oven Broiler. It cooks 3 ways — it toasts, broils, or bakes — yet won't take up a lot of space. Includes a 3 year limited warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Conveniently toast 4 slices of bread at once to save time It's perfect for everyday jobs, like making toast, cooking frozen meals, and reheating leftovers but does much more. Whether you're cooking a slice of frozen pizza or making tuna melts for dinner, you'll effortlessly cook foods to perfection in this toaster oven broiler.

Reliable products at reasonable prices. It’s not just a tagline, it’s what has led our product development for decades. Every Proctor Silex appliance begins its journey in our engineering lab. Motors rotate, switches turn and mechanical arms spin for days on end. Then it’s off to the kitchen, where the staff uses the product much like you would – cooking and creating to ensure it will make your life a bit easier. Proctor Silex 4 Slice Toaster Oven Broiler, 1100 Watts, Black and Silver Finish Bake small batches of brownies or broil chicken breasts for dinner without heating up your big oven. It gives you the versatility to cook 3 ways — toast, broil, or bake, yet it doesn't take up much space on the kitchen countertop. The toaster oven broiler has simple, straightforward manual controls that are easy to use and temperature range options from 200-450° F. It's great for anyone who wants a toaster oven broiler that has convenient features to efficiently cook a variety of foods without being over-complicated. Comes with 30 minute timer and auto-shutoff. Includes a 30 minute timer and auto-shutoff with ready bell The versatility to cook 3 ways — toast, broil, or bake Easy to use with simple manual controls Conveniently toast 4 slices of bread at once to save time in the kitchen Easy to clean with drop-down crumb tray

Features: Save Time in the Kitchen The toaster oven broiler conveniently toasts 4 slices of bread at once — enough for a family — to reduce the time you spend in the kitchen. 3 in 1 Versatility This toaster oven gives you the versatility to cook 3 ways — toast, broil, or bake, yet it won't take up a lot of space on your kitchen countertop. It's perfect for everyday jobs, like making toast, cooking frozen meals, and reheating leftovers. Easy-to-Use Manual Controls The toaster oven broiler has simple manual controls that are straightforward and easy to use. It's great for seniors, or anyone who wants a toaster oven that efficiently gets the job done without being complicated. Includes a 30 minute timer with auto shutoff and a ready bell that rings when the cooking cycle is complete.

Includes Bake Pan / Oven Rack The toaster oven comes with a bake pan for toasting and baking, and an oven rack for broiling. Easy to Clean The built-in crumb tray drops down to easily remove crumbs from the bottom of the toaster oven. Cook a Variety of Foods You can cook a variety of foods with temperature options ranging from 200-450° F.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: In the few weeks that I’ve had this toaster oven, I’ve made toast, baked a quick bread, and broiled salmon with it. Results have been very good, and cleaning is easy. With just two dials, it’s easy to use, and it appears to be well-constructed. After being disappointed with a couple of expensive toaster ovens that had failed after just 2-3 years of use, it’s good to find one that works at least as well, and at a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice smaller oven.
reviews.reviewText: This oven fits inside my pantry. Nice small oven. Only thing I dont particularly like is you can only bake for 30 minutes, then timer needs to be reset. But works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact oven
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a replacement for my large Black & Decker toaster oven. I've been using it 3 weeks and so far, so good. Works well, heats up fast, toast well and doesn't take up much counter space. The cord is super short but it wasn't a problem for my space but may be for yours. Removing the crumb tray is a little awkward but not a huge issue. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, basic toaster oven.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a replacement for an old Black and Decker toaster oven. Overall, I'm pleased with it. A little lower powered (1100 watts), but so far, has worked well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Middling toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this oven on-line quickly because our old one died. I just wanted a toaster oven without the rotisserie and other add-ons. This oven is a bit smaller than the old one. The controls are not as easy to use.I don't like the drop front door because it limits the use of the counter space. It is a little tricky to get the toast browned just as I want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is wonderful. I look forward to using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 5 months completely
reviews.reviewText: Sunset . This was for a 94 yo woman and she can only eat meals from a small oven . It completely stopped working after five months ! Not made well .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price is right!
reviews.reviewText: We love it here at the office! Simple easy toaster oven. Great price! Got the Warranty plan, too!

J'en cherchais un sans la fonction réchaud car souvent il arrivait que mon ancien se retrouvais sur cette fonction sans le vouloir. Je cherchais soit un avec un bouton on-off ce que je n'ai pas trouver donc celui-là est très pratique surtout quand on a des gens âgés à la maison
Cet appareil convient parfaitement a notre utilisation quotidienne. Merci
It generates a lot of heat, be careful of the placement. It is good for warming plates on top, however I am pleased with this purchase.
Great value. Easy to use. No digital components. Cord somewhat short.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn't brown the bread to make toast, just makes it melba toast!
reviews.reviewText: Even after following the instructions in the manual, making toast is impossible because the bread doesn't get toasted (brown on top and bottom) properly. It just becomes melba toast, crispy throughout. Replaced it with a Master Chef model which works much better.
